title: Exquisite Emerald and Diamond Bridal Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: and freshwater Pearls. Gold weight approximately 40 grams.
features: This majestic Haaram features a two-tiered cascading design. The upper tier showcases emerald accents interspersed within a floral CZ arrangement. The lower tier is accentuated with pearl drops and a central paisley-shaped pendant detailed with CZ and Emeralds. The intricate floral motifs and delicate filigree work are reminiscent of traditional South Indian artistry.
occasions: or any grand celebration. Also suitable for contemporary events where a statement piece is desired.
description: This Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality CZ stones provide exceptional brilliance while the emeralds add a touch of royalty. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail, this piece is a heirloom to be treasured for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine.
